text: The Zadié river is a tributary of the Ivindo river in northeastern Gabon. ==References== * Lerique Jacques. 1983. Hydrographie-Hydrologie. in Geographie et Cartographie du Gabon, Atlas Illustré led by The Ministère de l'Education Nationale de la Republique Gabonaise. Pg 14–15. Paris, France: Edicef. Category:Rivers of Gabon
title: Zadié River
